column2: The legendary member of the great Chad himself, a truly magnificent sight to behold.
Place for belts, strapons and other fun objects.

You return sooner than usual from a council meeting to be surprised by thundering echoes coming from your [This.GetHusbandWifeOpp] [This.Spouse.GetDynName]'s chambers. Much to your wife's shock you burst through the door while [This.Spouse.GetHerHis] lover vanishes out the window. [This.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] confesses that the lover's name is none other than the mythical Chad of the Thundercock.
